notifications.notification_game_won_text: The {game_title_link} collaboration is closed. Your iteration: "{winning_title}" has been unanimously chosen as the winner!
notifications.notification_game_closed_text: The {game_title_link} collaboration is closed. The winning text is "{winning_title}"
notifications.notification_game_invitation_text: You've been invited to collaborate on {game_title_link}
notifications.warning_game_won_text: The winning vote was just cast! The {game_title} collaboration is closed. Your iteration: "{winning_title}" has been unanimously chosen as the winner! Sadly, the text you are working on is no longer in the running.
notifications.warning_game_closed_text: The winning vote was just cast! The "{game_title}" collaboration is closed. The winning text is "{winning_title}". Sadly, the text you are working on is no longer in the running.

about.title: About Palinodes
about.description: Palinodes is an evolving experiment in writing as play. It's a space where short texts can be shaped and reshaped by different hands, until the process becomes etched into the text, and it finds its own voice. It's a space for offering a small text â€” not to the hive mind, nor the artificial one, but to a few singular, imperfect minds, for revision, erasure, and surprise. There's no wrong path. Palinodes tries to clear the way for many â€” and for the journeys they might incite.

creator.bio: Created by Melisandre Schofield, a writer and web developer with a background in visual arts and experimental narrative. She builds tools and experiences that bring people together â€” not just to write, but to play, surprise one another, and rediscover the strange alchemy of shared imagination.

home_error.default_error_message: Congratulations! Getting lost is the first step in getting anywhere worthwhile.

cr_it_ed.good_to_know_text:
While your title and prompt will be carved in STONE, your text will be rehashed by all who join the collaboration.

May the best iteration win!
cr_it_ed.prompt_placeholder: Instructions: how to run away from yourself, when you are also chasing yourself...
cr_it_ed.writing_placeholder: When you climb out the window, don't forget your rainboots.
cr_it_ed.joinability_disabled_message: The collaboration cannot be joinable by all if it is not visible to all.

home_index.title: collaborative writing
home_index.add_a_few_words: Remove from a text, by the handful.
home_index.write_a_sentence: Then, fill its mouth with words,
home_index.write_a_phrase: and wait for it to fight back.
home_index.add_a_few_words2: Tend to a text with a fine tooth comb.
home_index.write_a_sentence2: Whisper a secret in its ear,
home_index.write_a_phrase2: and wait for it to unfold.
home_index.how_to_collaborate_palinodes_description: Palinodes is a collaborative writing game where stories branch and evolve through voting and revision.
home_index.collaborate_step_one_text: Your own, or a pseudonymâ€”and a short bio, real or imagined.
home_index.collaborate_step_two_text: Climb a story tree . Read through the leaves. Let your feet swing off a branch . Each branch is a new version, written by a new friendâ€”or rival.
home_index.collaborate_step_three_text: Each version is both an homage and a transgression. Find your balance.
home_index.collaborate_step_four_text: Leave a mark on the texts that mark you, as you wander. Somewhere, a version will feel right â€” to everyone.
home_index.create_collaboration_step_one_text: Plant a handful of words, watch them stretch up and out, and follow them until you end up somewhere uncharted.
home_index.create_collaboration_step_two_text: You can cobble together a sentence or two, and hold it invisibly in your hands . Part your fingers for a friend or two, keep the scribbles to a whisper.
home_index.create_collaboration_step_three_text: Weâ€™ve drawn you a map. . You can pull it out at any timeâ€”or fold us a note of your own .

substeps.navigation: Click the login button in the navigation.
substeps.credentials: Enter your credentials or create an account.

substeps.introduction: Palinodes is a collaborative writing game. You can join an existing collaboration, or start your own. A starting text is iterated upon, each version branching out like a tree. The final version is chosen by voting. To continue, press >> (below).

substeps.navigation: Main navigation is on the top of the screen. Click on for pages, or for tutorials. When logged in, and give you access to your notifications and your profile. To continue, press >> (below).

substeps.places-explanation: In the menu, click on to see stories that have been started publicly.
substeps.list-explanation: This is a list of collaborations. Click on any title to see the "story tree."
substeps.story-trees-explanation: This is a story tree. Each branch is a new version written by a different contributor. Click on a title or heart to read a version.
substeps.story-nodes-explanation: Stories grow outward through iteration. Collaborators vote on versions. When one version receives enough votes, it becomes the final text, and its heart is replaced by a star. Press >> to continue (below).

substeps.congratulations: You've learned the basics! You can browse freely. To write or vote, youâ€™ll need an account. To learn how to start a story, join a collaboration, or vote on text nodes, access tutorials in the navigation ().

substeps.home: In the (top navigation) menu. Click on the icon.
substeps.dashboard: Click on the next to "My Stories".

substeps.create: Start a collaboration. Weâ€™ll guide you through the process. As you write, consider your words as a playground--foster questions, tension, conflict, the quietly poetic.
substeps.title: Create a title--to help guide your collaborators. This will be the title of the final piece.
substeps.prompt: Your prompt will guide iterations. Goerges Saunders may have said that good writing articulates a question, not its answer--let this guide you.
substeps.writing: Write something. No more than 50 words. This will be changed, added to, and cut. Write the imperfect, so that it can be perfected.
substeps.publish: Before "publishing", optionally: add comma-seperated keywords (for searchability), make this "private", or invite someone (we'll send them a link).

substeps.congratulations: ðŸŽ‰ Congratulations! You've successfully started a collaboration! The tutorial is now complete.

contribute.title: How to Contribute to a text

substeps.dashboard: In the top navigation places menu, click on the dashboard icon.
substeps.explore: Under "Stories I Can Join", click on the icon to the right of "Other", or "Invitations" (if you have any). Either will bring you to a more detailed list.
substeps.view: Click on different titles to view story trees .

substeps.explore: Click on the icons / titles to explore evolving stories. A story tree can also be viewed more "linearly" as a list ("shelf" view).
substeps.iterate: When find a text you'd like to branch from, click the "iterate" button, to start writing.

substeps.write: Start your contribution. We'll guide you through the process.
substeps.title: Describe your changes in three words or less (ex: changed the tense, added flashback...).
substeps.writing: Change the text. Additions and removals are both counted--try both. Don't be shy.
substeps.publish: Publish when ready. Optionally, add comma-seperated keywords for searchability.

substeps.congratulations: ðŸŽ‰ Congratulations! You've successfully published your contribution! The tutorial is now complete.

vote.title: How to Vote on Text Nodes

substeps.dashboard: Click on "places" (top navigation) to visit your dashboard . *You may only vote on other people's contributions to stories you've published to. If you are new, the "Contribute to a Story" tutorial will help you get started.
substeps.active: In "My Stories", your shared collaborations will be listed. Click on the icon to the right of "Active (no drafts pending)" for a detailed list.
substeps.view: Click on a title to view the story tree .

substeps.explore: Click on hearts / titles. Explore how a story evolves. Determine which contributions you like.
substeps.vote_action: Click on the heart paddle to vote/unvote. Don't see a heart paddle? Is this node yours? Have you only drafted (not published) a contribution?

substeps.congratulations: ðŸŽ‰ Great! You've cast or uncast your vote! The tutorial is now complete.
